response.overview: On a sunny day, gorgeous Serena A drifts into her kitchen from the terrace, wearing a sheer, cool cotton blouse, pristine white lace panties, and spike-heeled sandals. A sassy belly tattoo peeks out above her underwear, and her waist-length, golden-blonde hair is worn loose and free. She is on a mission to embrace the purity of a raw, vegan summer, and her first bite into a crisp, juicy apple is a sweet treat for her taste buds. Suddenly, this is about more than just a health kick – her smoldering brown eyes linger over a rustic bowl brimming with fruits and vegetables: a vibrant carrot, a ripe banana. But she reaches for a large cucumber. It’s garden-fresh, cool and firm to the touch, and her naughty imagination begins to race. Soon, Serena’s quest for a wholesome salad gives way to a far more decadent craving – one that only she can satisfy, hot in the shade behind closed doors…
response.title: Big Cucumber 2
